summary: A tiny little patch the changes the requirements for building the arcane enchanter in Hearthfire homes from needing beeswax to using candles instead.
descriptionHtml:
I created this tweak for my personal use, but feel others may find it useful. 

I was stuck in my recent playthrough with crafting an arcane enchanter for Lakeview Manor.  Since I could not find any honeycomb anywhere for the beeswax (A change by CACO), I figured it would be far easier to use candles as I can easily craft then with the normal loot obtained from Hunterborn (along with the Candles and Lantern patches)...  So, this patch was created.  I can now finally finish up my home.



This mod simply changes the Hearthfire crafting recipe for the arcane enchanter from requiring beeswax (Complete Alchemy and Cooking Overhaul) to using Candles (Candles and Lanterns).

I recommend placing this after both CACO and Candles and Lanterns.  Since this solely changes the Hearthfire buildable object, it should not conflict with any other mods.


Required Mods:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69306/]Complete Alchemy and Cooking Overhaul[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28377/]Candles and Lanterns[/url]
author: netmc
